TEXT.English: Hey buddy! I'm [OUR_NAME], you know -- from [OUR_EMPIRE]. Do you know of my good friend Twilight Sparkle?
Yeah, right! Bullies and jerks like you don't get to talk to me. Leave me alone!
No way, that's not happening anytime soon. You need to be taught a lesson: Stop bullying my friends!
Good. I'm glad we see eye-to-eye on this, [CT_NAME]. There's no need for a pointless conflict between us.
Hey buddy, how goes the whole 'planning a civilization' thing? Do you want something?
You have a lot of guts showing up in my face, [CT_NAME], after all we've been through! What do YOU want?
Dude, like, these nuclear weapons are totally hard-core. Maybe these beauties will get Princess Twilight Sparkle to come and visit me now!
Pal, I could really use this tribute. What do you say to this deal?
Buddy, I would really appreciate it if you could be a real pal and accept this request!
[CT_NAME], accepting this deal would be a good idea if you want to keep our friendship going. What's your answer?
Buddy, I would really appreciate it if you could be a pal and accept this small request!
Pal, I could really use a small donation! What do you think of my small request, eh?
[CT_NAME], please accept my small request! Surely, you wouldn't mind helping me out... Come on, don't leave a friend hanging!
Think you could really make use of this, [CT_NAME]? I'm always glad to give a buddy a boost!
Pal, I think you should have this. It ought to help you out quite a bit!
Need some help, buddy? I think you'll like what I have to share with you...
Why don't you take this deal, buddy? This is the best I can do for the moment.
Are you finally ready to stop all this fighting, 'pal'?
Hey buddy! Let's do some trading! Are you up for this offer?
Hey pal, sorry about this. I don't think this deal is good for either of us anymore. We could always get a new trade going, if you're not ready to cancel this deal yet...
I will not tolerate your harmful behavior any longer, [CT_NAME] -- bullies like you must be stopped! Your reign of terror will soon end forever! ([OUR_NAME] declares war!)
